attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The continuing state of affairs surrounding expenses claimed by MP's led by a Prime Minister who was not elected to the position is untenable and action must be taken to allow the voters of the United Kingdon to either endorse the current position or bring about change for the good of the Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
